div.div: Ripon College vs. Lake Forest College
at Lake Forest, Ill. | Farwell Field

tr.td: LFC wins toss and will receive. Ripon will defend west end zone.
Trey Ashby kickoff 45 yards to the LFC20, Alex Pasiewicz return 22 yards to the LFC42 (Ethan Hoffman).
Lake Forest College drive start at 15:00.
Joey Valdivia rush for 3 yards to the LFC45 (Hunter Gruenwal).
Jagan Cleary pass complete to Sam Mulford for 9 yards to the RC46 (Patrick Barany).
